name: City Coach Bus Driving
description:
Come and play the most exciting truck driving game. City Coach Bus Driving gives you a realistic bus driving experience.

Detailed bus vehicles, realistic interiors and the beautiful open world city environment will make you feel like driving a real bus! Get behind the wheel of the bus and drive around the big open world city to complete all the routes!

FEATURES
- Real life traffic
- Beautiful city environment
- Challenging missions
- Different grand buses to drive
- Realistic bus physics
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic bus interiors
- Realistic game sound effects
- Fresh attractive music
